name: Toggle
description: A UI element that represents a toggle button with on/off states.

instanceFields.label: Label
instanceFields.description: The label text displayed next to the Toggle.

instanceFields.label: Text
instanceFields.description: The text displayed by the Toggle.

instanceFields.label: Value
instanceFields.description: The current value of the Toggle (true = checked, false = unchecked).

instanceMethods.label: OnValueChanged
instanceMethods.description: Sets the method to be called when the Toggle value changes.

parameters.name: valueChangedEvent
parameters.description: Method that will be called with the new boolean value as parameter

instanceMethods.label: SetValueWithoutNotify
instanceMethods.description: Sets the value of the Toggle without triggering any change events.
